title: Topics in Geomorphology
description: Discussion of journal articles focused on a theme in contemporary geomorphology. Topics include: coupling of climate; tectonics and landscape evolution; mechanics of bedrock river channels; fundamentals of fluvial gravel transport; and inference of tectonic rates and processes from analysis of topography. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students; qualified undergraduates may enroll by permission of instructor.
